subject: p13914812
Findings: Status post spinal reconstruction with according postoperative devices in situ. Right internal jugular vein catheter in correct position. Cutaneous clips. The lung volumes are low. There is atelectasis in the retrocardiac lung region. Borderline size of the cardiac silhouette without evidence of pulmonary edema or pleural effusions. No focal parenchymal opacities indicating pneumonia.
